articles.author: Helen Pitt
articles.title: Black Friday bonanza? No, it’s just a black day for Australia - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: I love America and Americans, but this day devoted to retail is one tradition we don’t need to import.
articles.content:
If you hadnt noticed, Friday, November 25 is Black Friday. That is the day after the fourth Thursday in November, which is the Thanksgiving holiday in the United States.
When Australians hear Black … [+1902 chars]
